title: Only One New Xbox In Development - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.21.1919
description:
Get $10 off your first order of $15 when you use promo code "KindaFunny" https://grhb.me/kindafunny

Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/games right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Fran and Tim go over the latest Xbox news, Anthem updates, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
Watch Andrea stream for GuardianCon’s St. Jude’s Charity Marathon from 5:00pm-9:00pm PT TONIGHT! Twitch.tv/guardiancon or we’ll be hosting on our Twitch at twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:03:30 - Rumor - Only One Next-Gen Xbox in Development
00:13:55 - Halo Infinite Beta Coming to Xbox First; Split-Screen Running, More
00:22:01 - Anthem Isn’t Working Very Well, Says EA
00:31:28 - Switch Mini Cases in the Wild
00:36:33 - Elden Ring an Evolution of Dark Souls
00:38:54 - Out today
00:41:34 -  Grubhub
00:43:28 - Brooklinen
00:44:40 - Quip
Reader mail   -
00:46:11 - “Do you think that Bungie is already working on or planning Destiny 3?” - The 5 Star Man
00:51:17 - “How will our industry celebrate the lives of icons as we get older and deaths become more commonplace?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:59:46 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Fran and Andrea
Tuesday - Greg and Andrea
Wednesday - Greg and Whitta
Thursday - Greg and Andrea
Friday - Greg and Tim
